audioText: Ce gars a l'esprit tranquille maintenant qu'il a rendu son compte à temps.
question: Why is this guy's mind at peace?
options: Because he submitted his report on time
Because he finished his workout routine
Because he paid all his bills
Because he resolved a family conflict
explanation: The text states 'Ce gars a l'esprit tranquille maintenant qu'il a rendu son compte à temps' - This guy has a peaceful mind now that he has submitted his report on time. This targets the nouns 'gars', 'esprit', and 'compte' in a work completion context.
source: Strategic noun targeting: gars, esprit, compte
